agency.title: Be Safe Health and Tourism Agency
agency.paragraph1: When you choose the Be Safe Health clinic, you can rest assured that nothing is more important to us than your health.
agency.paragraph2: Everything we do is designed to make your journey more enjoyable. Our longevity in the sector comes from the results we achieve and the lives we change.
agency.paragraph3: In our healthcare facilities equipped with the most advanced technologies of modern medicine, our specialist doctors and experienced healthcare staff prepare the most suitable treatment and rehabilitation programs for you. We offer a professional approach for surgeries, aesthetic procedures, dental treatments, medical check-ups, and more.

hair.title: Saç Ekimi
hair.description: Modern saç ekimi teknikleri ile doğal ve kalıcı sonuçlar elde ediyoruz. FUE (Follicular Unit Extraction) ve DHI (Direct Hair Implantation) gibi en gelişmiş yöntemleri kullanarak, hastalarımıza en iyi deneyimi sunuyoruz.

dental.title: Diş Tedavileri
dental.description: Modern diş hekimliği teknolojileri ile estetik ve fonksiyonel diş tedavileri sunuyoruz. İmplant, zirkonyum kaplama, ortodonti ve estetik diş beyazlatma gibi kapsamlı hizmetlerimizle gülüşünüzü yeniden tasarlıyoruz.

aesthetic.title: Rinoplasti
aesthetic.description: Estetik cerrahi alanında uzman doktorlarımız ile doğal ve uyumlu sonuçlar elde ediyoruz. Rinoplasti, yüz estetiği ve vücut kontürü gibi işlemlerde en gelişmiş teknikleri kullanarak hastalarımızın beklentilerini aşıyoruz.

accommodation.title: Accommodation Services
accommodation.p1: Throughout your health tourism journey, your comfort and convenience are our priority. Our accommodation services are carefully designed to provide you with the best experience.
accommodation.p2: We plan the most suitable options and coordinate requests on your behalf, in sync with VIP transport, interpreter support and clinical appointments.

professional.title: Professional Service
professional.p1: Your health and satisfaction are our priority. We deliver top-tier professional healthcare with an experienced team and accredited partners.
professional.p2: Our coordination team is with you at every step to guide your consultations, surgery planning and follow-ups.

consulting.title: Consultancy Service
consulting.p1: Our consultants help you research options, choose the right treatment, and organize travel.
consulting.p2: We provide a single point of contact for your questions and requests to make your experience effortless.

planning.title: Travel Planning
planning.p1: We combine flights, accommodation, transfers, and clinic visits into a single schedule for a seamless experience.
planning.p2: We offer flexible choices and coordinate details ahead of time, so you can focus on a healthy journey.

transfer.title: Transfer Service
transfer.p1: Friendly, experienced drivers safely transport you from the airport or any location to your accommodation.
transfer.p2: We track flights, handle delays, and provide VIP vehicles with on-time clinic-hotel transfers.

tours.title: Touristic Tours
tours.p1: Beyond treatment, we offer curated tour programs for a delightful, satisfying trip.
tours.p2: From guided tours to custom itineraries, we plan flexibly around your care schedule.

cta.title: Are you ready to start?
cta.subtitle: Take the first step with our expert team in 5 minutes.

step1.title: Quick Pre-Evaluation
step1.desc: Send your photo and info; get suitability and a plan the same day.
step1.process: Send your photos and basic information through our secure portal. Our medical team will review and provide initial assessment within 24 hours.

step2.title: Personal Planning
step2.desc: Flight/accommodation options and operation schedule; tailored to your budget and needs.
step2.process: Our coordinators will create a personalized plan including flight options, accommodation choices, and detailed treatment schedule based on your preferences.

step3.title: Arrival & Welcome
step3.desc: VIP transfer and check-in; pre-op consult and hairline design.
step3.process: VIP airport pickup with luxury vehicle, direct transfer to your accommodation, and immediate consultation with your assigned doctor.

step4.title: Operation
step4.desc: Comfort-focused process; experienced team and sterile environment.
step4.process: State-of-the-art facilities with experienced medical team. Continuous monitoring and immediate post-operative care in recovery room.

step5.title: Care & Training
step5.desc: First wash, medication kit; 10-min personal care training.
step5.process: Detailed care instructions, medication management, and practical training for home care. Includes comprehensive care kit and emergency contacts.

step6.title: Remote Follow-up
step6.desc: 3, 6, 12 month checks; photo follow-up and doctor review.
step6.process: Regular check-ins at 3, 6, and 12 months. Photo-based progress tracking and virtual consultations with your doctor.
